definition: Jingbian County in Yulin 榆林[Yu2 lin2], Shaanxi
suffix of a noun of locality
Jingbian County in Yulin 榆林[Yu2 lin2], Shaanxi

sentences.english: Jingbian County is one of the major corn producing areas in North Shaanxi .
sentences.chinese: 靖邊屬陝北玉米主產區之一。

sentences.english: The Jingbian Gasfield is located in the central of the Ordos Basin.
sentences.chinese: 靖邊氣田位於鄂爾多斯盆地的中部地區。
